#summary Requirements for building this projects.

= Requirements =

Jackrabbitexplorer is built using [http://ant.apache.org/ Apache Ant] and is tested against the latest release, 1.8.2.

It uses the [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/ Google Web Toolkit] and requires version [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/versions.html 2.2.0].
It does not currently build with the latest release, 2.3.0.
